text.autoconfig.Yttrium.title: Yttrium Config
text.autoconfig.Yttrium.option.tweaks.cl: The string written here will be used as your client brand when connecting to Minecraft servers, if nothing is written it will not change
text.autoconfig.Yttrium.option.tweaks.fu: Set to true for the Z axis in the debug menu (F3) to display as completely blue like the other axes rather than a washed out blue
text.autoconfig.Yttrium.option.tweaks.nu: Set to true to disable the movement blocking that occurs when holding two movement keys at the same time
text.autoconfig.Yttrium.option.tweaks.sp: Set to true to keep your crosshair and currently selected block outline visible when in spectator mode
text.autoconfig.Yttrium.option.tweaks.tr: Set to true to display your total experience before being converted to a level in brackets beside your level
